participant_1.background:
I'm not sure if I'll ever know my ethnic background, but I'm happy with the family I've found.
I once ran away from home for a day to escape my parents' strict rules.
I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
I enjoy riding horses, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so.

participant_2.background:
I live in a city where I can always find a basketball court.
i write short films.
i found out that i am carrying twins.
I took up brewing my own beer and became a regular at local car shows with my Ford F-150.
My family is full of witty people and we love cats.

content.text: Hey, did you know that cats are the most popular pets in the United States?
Yes, I do know that! I love cats. My family is full of witty people and we love cats. What about you?
I love cats too! My family is not really a cat-person, but I have always loved them.
That's great! What kind of cats do you like?
I like all kinds of cats, but I have a special place in my heart for tabby cats.
I love tabby cats too! They're so cute and cuddly.
Do you have any cats of your own?
No, I don't have any cats of my own, but I would love to have one someday.
You should totally get a cat! They're the best pets.
I know, I know! I've been thinking about it for a while.
Well, if you ever do get a cat, you should let me know! I would love to meet it.
I will! Thanks for talking to me about cats. I feel better about getting one now.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help
